action.name: Set text
action.param: uppercase("Top Score:" & newline & "Your Score:" & newline & "Ring Score:")

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Use " & (Trys * 5) & " rings to" & newline & "stay in the game"

action.name: Open URL in new window
action.param: "https://www.twitter.com/intent/tweet?source=webclient&text=Found a new awesome game, my highscore is " & (OldRecord>0?OldRecord:0) & " %23" & GameName
